input_files.name: bam
input_files.help: path to the input bam file

arguments.name: bqc_gff
arguments.description: Use a specified annotation file as annotation set
arguments.help: Use a specified annotation file as annotation set

arguments.name: bqc_genome
arguments.description: The directory containing species/assembly to use.
arguments.help: The directory containing species/assembly to use.

arguments.name: bqc_species
arguments.help: The genome species to use. If the couple species assembly does not exist, BamQC will try to download it.

arguments.name: bqc_assembly
arguments.description: The genome assembly associated to the species to use.
arguments.help: The genome assembly associated to the species to use.

arguments.name: bqc_available
arguments.description: [Pattern] List the genomes available on the Babraham Server which are filtered using the string Pattern if this is provided.
arguments.help: [Pattern] List the genomes available on the Babraham Server which are filtered using the string Pattern if this is provided.

arguments.name: bqc_help
arguments.description: Print this help file and exit
arguments.help: Print this help file and exit

arguments.name: bqc_version
arguments.description: Print the version of the program and exit
arguments.help: Print the version of the program and exit

arguments.name: bqc_outdir
arguments.description: Create all output files in the specified output directory.
arguments.help: Create all output files in the specified output directory.

arguments.name: bqc_extract
arguments.description: If set then the zipped output file will be uncompressed in the same directory after it has been created.
arguments.help: If set then the zipped output file will be uncompressed in the same directory after it has been created.

arguments.name: bqc_java
arguments.description: Provides the full path to the java binary you want to use to launch bamqc. If not supplied then java is assumed to be in your path
arguments.help: Provides the full path to the java binary you want to use to launch bamqc. If not supplied then java is assumed to be in your path

arguments.name: bqc_noextract
arguments.description: Do not uncompress the output file after creating it
arguments.help: Do not uncompress the output file after creating it

arguments.name: bqc_nogroup
arguments.description: Disable grouping of bases for reads >50bp.
arguments.help: Disable grouping of bases for reads >50bp.

arguments.name: bqc_threads
arguments.description: Specifies the number of files which can be processed simultanenously
arguments.help: Specifies the number of files which can be processed simultanenously

arguments.name: bqc_limits
arguments.description: Specifies a non-default file which contains a set of criteria which will be used to determine the warn/error limits for the various modules
arguments.help: Specifies a non-default file which contains a set of criteria which will be used to determine the warn/error limits for the various modules

arguments.name: bqc_quiet
arguments.description: Supress all progress messages on stdout and only report errors.
arguments.help: Supress all progress messages on stdout and only report errors.

arguments.name: bqc_dir
arguments.description: Selects a directory to be used for temporary files written when generating report images
arguments.help: Selects a directory to be used for temporary files written when generating report images
